title: What does a teacher teach in the US secondary school? - Quora

response.answer_text: In general, U.S. secondary schools teach four main subjects: MathScienceSocial Studies/HistoryEnglish/Reading/LiteratureBut that’s only a basic outline, and there are many variations on what is specifically taught under those general headings. In addition to that, secondary school teachers teach a variety of additional subjects, depending on the school, including: Gym/Physical Education (PE)Foreign languagesArtsMusicComputer technologyVarious elective coursesIt’s also worth keeping in mind that in the U.S., school curricula are set on the local level, and not the federal or state level. While the federal and state governments do provide very basic outlines, the courses themselves are designed locally, via local school boards.
